Text: This episode was great. Its the best episode of season 18. Other ones sucked except episode 1.
Yes, the 18'th season has been lousy, like if they're out of ideas. But this episode's got a straight story to tell, and is actually pretty good. :)
Maybe they've used up all the good ideas for the movie? ;D

Let's hope so =P (That the movie will be good that is)

Anyways, thank you! =D
Thanks a lot for this cool episode!
